Voluminous Volume Building Mascara is uniquely formulated to resist clumping, soften and build lashes up to 5X their natural thickness.

-The unique maximizing formula quickly thickens and builds lashes in a single application for a full and dramatic look.
-The Volume Maximizing Curved Brush matches the shape of your lashes to thicken lashes evenly and smoothly, leaving them soft with virtually no flakes, smudges, or clumps.

Clump-resistant. Fragrance-free. Ophthalmologist-tested and allergy-tested. Suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers.

5X fuller lashes
